thread.title: Tours from Europe bases | Stars and Stripes
thread.title_full: Tours from Europe bases | Stars and Stripes

author: archyde
title: Tours from Europe bases | Stars and Stripes
text:
Delft Pottery Workshop: A Hands-On Experience​ in the Netherlands Calling all art enthusiasts and travel⁣ lovers!‍ SHAPE ⁢Trips and Tours is offering ⁢a unique opportunity ⁣to delve into the world of Dutch pottery with a ⁢special workshop and lunch experience at the Royal Delft Museum on February 22nd.
Imagine yourself in the heart of Delft, surrounded by the rich history and artistry of this renowned pottery ⁣tradition. ⁢You’ll have the chance to learn from skilled artisans, get your hands dirty, and​ create your own unique piece of Delftware.
The workshop⁣ promises a hands-on experience, guiding you through the entire process, from shaping the clay to decorating⁤ your creation. It’s a ​chance⁤ to unleash your creativity and take ⁤home a tangible souvenir of your trip to‍ the Netherlands.
After your creative ​journey, you’ll enjoy a delicious lunch at the Royal Delft Museum, surrounded by the museum’s stunning collection of historic Delftware.⁤ This immersive ‌experience combines the joy⁤ of making‌ art with the pleasure of exploring Dutch culture and history.
This is more than ​just⁢ a workshop; it’s a chance to connect with a centuries-old tradition,learn new⁣ skills,and ⁣create lasting memories.
Explore Europe ⁢with Military Base⁤ Tours Planning a European adventure? Base ‌tours offer an accessible way for members of the military community to experience exciting destinations. ⁤ Here’s a glimpse of upcoming trips and⁢ opportunities ⁢to immerse ‌yourself in different cultures.
Belgium
SHAPE Trips and Tours is providing a variety of excursions,starting with a visit to Cologne on January‌ 25th. You’ll enjoy a guided tour exploring the city’s historical‌ landmarks and architectural marvels, including the iconic Cologne ⁣Cathedral.​
The‍ programme continues with a pottery workshop and a ‌delightful lunch at the Royal Delft Museum in Delft, ‌Netherlands,‍ on February 22nd. History and art enthusiasts can indulge in a ⁤parfum​ workshop in⁣ Paris ⁢on March 8th. ⁤ For those seeking a longer trip,
SHAPE Trips and Tours is also organizing a 5-day adventure to ‍Spain from March 12th to 16th.
For inquiries and bookings, call⁣ 06544-3884,⁤ email shapetripsandtours1@gmail.com, or explore their website at www.shape2day.com. Germany
Discover the beauty⁣ of the German Alps and Austrian countryside with Ansbach Outdoor Recreation. Embark on an invigorating journey to Oberstdorf​ on ⁤February 8th or March 22nd, with trips priced between $99 and $139.
For a picturesque escape, explore the charming town of Lermoos (Austria) on March 8th. Adults can enjoy the experience for $139, ⁢while children aged⁢ 16-18 can join for $109 and children aged 5-15 for $99.
Conclude your adventure with a thrilling 4-day trip to Saalbach hinterglenn (Austria) from March 27th to 30th. Adults‍ can join for $429 and children for $329.
Adventure Awaits: ⁤Exciting Outings and Tours for Military ‍Families Calling ​all military families stationed across Europe! Get ⁢ready for an unforgettable experience with a wealth of⁢ exciting outings ​and tours designed just‍ for you. Whether you crave snowy slopes, ‌historical explorations, or cultural immersions, ther’s something to ignite your wanderlust.‍
Skiing and Snowboarding Thrills Calling ⁣all ​snow bunnies and adrenaline junkies! Several locations offer fantastic ski​ and snowboarding opportunities. In Grafenwoehr, embrace​ the slopes with a trip to Nebelhorn (Feb ⁢15-16) or Juwel Alpenbachtal (Feb 22) ‌for ⁣an exhilarating experience. For a taste of Austrian charm, set your sights on Zillerbachtal (March⁤ 15) and enjoy breathtaking views alongside the thrill of the slopes.
Unforgettable Cultural Adventures Immerse yourselves in the rich tapestry of European culture with captivating tours. Kaiserslautern boasts ⁢a⁣ range of exciting itineraries. Embark on a mesmerizing journey to Iceland (Feb 13-17) to⁤ witness the island’s dramatic landscapes and unique culture. Alternatively,​ delve into history‍ during a poignant‍ visit to Krakow and Auschwitz (Feb 13-17).​ For⁤ a touch of Irish charm, join Paddy’s Week in‍ Ireland‍ (March 15-23) and soak in the vibrant atmosphere.
Celebrating Together: Valentine’s Day​ and Christmas “There’s magic in the air,” says RTT Travel Ramstein, inviting families to create lasting memories.⁣ Indulge in a romantic Arctic adventure (Feb 14-17), ‌embrace the festive spirit with a⁢ Christmas ‍Grand Slam (Dec 20-22),‌ or embark on‌ an Epic European Capitals journey to Ljubljana and Zagreb (March‌ 30-April 4). For a special‌ Valentine’s Day treat, enjoy a Swiss Valentine trip (Feb 15) or⁣ a candy-coated Cologne adventure (March 8).
Discovering Local adventures Looking for something closer‌ to home? Explore the outdoors with outings organized by local recreational facilities. Learn essential bushcraft​ skills in Stuttgart (Feb 8) or visit the spring flea market (March 15). ‌Wiesbaden ‍offers a unique opportunity to brush up on⁢ your shooting knowledge with their US forces​ sports shooting knowledge course (Jan 23). ‌
Ready for an adventure? Explore These Unforgettable Experiences Calling all thrill-seekers and culture enthusiasts! Get ready‍ to embark on unforgettable journeys with⁢ these exciting trips and tours. From breathtaking natural landscapes to captivating historical sites, ⁣there’s something for everyone to enjoy.
For the outdoor adventurer, a ski and snowboard trip to Granada from February 14th to 17th promises ‍exhilarating slopes and stunning mountain views. immerse yourself​ in the beauty of nature ‌with a⁢ hike through the Grazalema Natural Park on February 22nd,or challenge yourself with a mountain bike ride in Pinar de la ⁤Algaida on March 1st.
History buffs will be captivated by the Nerja Caves and Frigiliana historical ⁤tour on February ⁤1st,offering⁢ a glimpse into the region’s ​rich past. Alternatively, delve into the grandeur of ⁣the San Marcos castle and bullring on February⁢ 22nd, where you can witness the legacy of Spain’s vibrant culture. ‌
Looking for a unique ⁤experience? Embark on a thrilling ⁢canyon descent on March 22nd,or explore the majestic Grazalema park on March 29th. And for a truly romantic getaway, treat yourself to a special Valentine’s Day Arabian⁣ bath and dinner on February ⁣15th.
For those seeking culinary delights, a foodie tour featuring Jamon Iberico on January 25th⁢ promises a tantalizing taste of Spain’s renowned cuisine.
Ready to plan your next adventure?⁣ Contact Outdoor Recreation (ODR) at DSN 727-3101 or CIV 095682-3101/3208, or ⁤reach out to Tickets and Travel at DSN 727-3101/3208 or CIV 095682-3101/3208.
